name: Spaceship Driver License
description:
Welcome to the galaxy of technology! It is very nice that she is getting closer and closer to ordinary people. This game shows a little bit about the future, in which everyone will be able to get a license to operate a spaceship. Perhaps this is the only way to get around, so it would be useful for you to attend a driving school. Are you ready to be among the first to get access to this innovation? Game genre - survival action. You need to avoid the obstacles that arise in front of you. Arm yourself with great attention, because the speed of movement is enormous, you don't have a single chance to make a mistake. Are you ready to make history?

Game Features:
  • 2 types of spaceships ("Falcon" and "Sniper")
  • 10 levels
  • Tremendous speed and unforeseen obstacles
